public class LocalAxis
extends java.lang.Object

Class for Local axis systems of nodes and one dimensional elements.

Constructor Detail

LocalAxis

public LocalAxis(java.lang.String name,
                 int type,
                 double[] values)
Creates LocalAxis object.

Parameters:
name - Name of local axis.
type - The type of local axis.
values - Rotation angles of local axis (point -> length = 3, line -> length = 1). For point type, the angle sequence is rotations about x, y' and z'' in degrees, respectively. For line type, the axial rotation in degrees.
